Name: Kaion Tale MMORPG
About the game: Immerse yourself in a magical 2D world with thousands of online players in this MMORPG! * Factions Choose a side in this great story! Fight with the Draxian nobles or the ferocious Naru. * PvP Fight other players in this open world or compete in the world ranking to get fabulous prizes or rewards! *Exploration Explore a huge open world full of magic and adventures to reveal. Meet new friends on your own adventure! * Professiones Choose between 3 professions: mining, elementalism and jewelry. *Enchantment Love your items to improve them *Commerce Make exchanges with other players to get items, materials, minerals and even pets! *Emotes React with emotes to have fun with other friends in game. History: Recent military encounters have unleashed a new war between the Draxian and the Naru. Join the noble draxian warriors, those who fight for justice and order. Or fight alongside the ancestral Naru tribe, defending nature and balance in the universe. Create new friends and play with thousands of people online!
